duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead SAP data conversion projects, implementing BRF+ configurations and providing debugging support.
Utilize SAP IS-U FICA expertise to guide and support the functional aspects of SAP FICA and Utilities projects.
Demonstrate excellent communication and presentation skills while leading meetings and client interactions.
Collaborate with the team to execute full life cycle implementations and roll-outs for SAP projects.
Ensure compliance with ISO standards and efficient use of utility industry knowledge in support and implementation projects.

education_certification.credential: Relevant SAP Certification or certification in the Core area (Advantage)
